name: Meg Stroh
text:
We decided to give this joint one more try after 4 years. We had a bad experience and hadn't been back. Total transparency: most of the food was pretty good. It's the environment, employees, and lack of customer service that will prevent us from returning for probably another 4 years, if ever.

The hostess had her mask below her nose the *entire* visit. Our server and at least one other server, also had their masks below their nose most of the time we were there. However admittedly, our server did occasionally pull his up.

We had to ask for refills, napkins, and our check, as those things were not provided or offered intuitively.

Lastly, our sever rang up our order wrong. I ordered a hamburger slider/garden bar combo meal for $12.99 and he rung it up separately, $9.99 for the garden bar and $4.99 for the hamburger sliders.
When I pointed it out (after he'd rung us out, my husband was paying...), he said he'd tell his manager and she'd come handle it.
Instead he came back with $2 and said his manager said the difference is $2 so here we go.

The difference was actually $2.18 and let's be real, $0.18 doesn't matter right? I obviously don't NEED 18 cents.
However, the principle of the matter: if a manager is going to ROUND something out in order to avoid the complication of re-ringing things up and refunding money to our card... fine. But don't do it in YOUR favor. Give me $2 and a quarter?

It just got under my skin... Ruby Tuesday does have to work a little harder than most places because they're fighting off several negative experiences by myself and my husband, even before me.... so they're walking a tighter rope.

But we won't be back anytime soon. Sadly, because I do really enjoy the salad bar.

name: Chelli Flores
text: Great food and service. Salad bar had a nice selection.

name: Anita Factory
text: Food was disappointing and bland. Manager made excuses instead of acknowledging the issue. In Troy we only have a few options it would be nice to have enjoyed this meal. I will not be coming back  EVERYTIME I come I do not enjoy my experience or food. I have given it multiple chances. Hoping it will be better. I have learned my lesson Ruby Tuesday’s in Troy,AL does not have quality food. The menu is amazing and the location is perfect. There should be no issues. ALSO BATHROOMS NASTY. GLASSES OLD AND BROKEN.

name: Tiffany Dobbs
text: My bf and I went and we ordered drinks and he got a long island iced tea and I got the drink special that day. His long island iced tea came out not even the right color. It was made with margarita mix and obviously the bartender didn't know what they were doing. So the waitress brought him another one and it was still very light like the color of lemonade but he just let it go. Both of our drinks tasted extremely watered down. I got some chicken pharm and it was nothing but a frozen tv dinner. You could tell they had left it under a heat lamp while waiting on my boyfriend's steak to cook. Which was only medium rare. We asked for salt and pepper and we were given little to go paper packs and this may be a petty complaint but I feel like a 80 dollar meal should include at least real salt and pepper shakers. We used to love it. We won't ever go back.

name: Barbara Coots
text: For $30 we got 2 raw hamburgers. No condiments. Cold hard buns. We returned the order. Manager made it right and we got 2 delicious burger on steamed bun with condiments. But I won't go back because theres a 50% chance it won't be good.

name: Qwandaisia Adams
text:
I ordered takeout through door dash. Received only half of my order. I’m not quite sure who is exactly responsible for the missing items or the drink I received that was half way filled.
(Asked for lemonade no ice)
May I recommend that Ruby Tuesday staple all to go orders through door dash just to give the customer a piece of mind. I would also like to add that the rice pilaf was super salty! Food was COLD when I received it I didn’t enjoy it at all. This restaurant is to pricey to not make sure the food is served correctly and that the customer is satisfied. Maybe a better experience next time!

name: VaNessa Frost
text: The food was delicious but customer service was lacking Patiently stood at the bar to pick up my order At least 3 employees were around but none acknowledged me or said that someone would be with me After many minutes went to the car to call them to see if it was ready She said yes that it was at bar Went back in to get it Still took several minutes to get my order as she had to look for it Not the first time that I've gone there and been ignored If not never it will be a long time before I go there again!

name: John Rhodes
text: Does what it does ok, liked the steaks and food of the past better.

name: Christian Harris
text: It's a lil pricy for what you get, but that's the deal with any Ruby Tuesday's. Our waitress, Adrianna, did a great job, and the food did taste amazing! Place was clean, and the environment was nice, I've eaten here before and I'm certain I will eat here again!

name: Liz Angelica
text: Food was ok. Not worth the prices. Waitress was friendly and attentive.

name: Mike Goodall
text: We had one of the rudest servers I have ever had. She brought drinks to everyone one person in our group. His tea was sitting right beside her at the stand she was standing at. He raised his hand and motioned for her and she shouted...I will be right there, so I shouted right back, do you mind bring him his tea??  She brought it over, he thanked her and she never said a word, just walked away. 3 of us ordered salads. We got them and came back and set down. No silverware on the table. We tried to stop her two times as she walked buy. On the third time, I just leaned out to block her path and told her we needed something to eat our food with. She brought it and set them all down on the table and I handed them out to the 5 of us. She brought out one of the food orders and said the others were on their way. After 3 or 4 minutes she brought out the other two plates. One was missing his brickley, she said she would be right back with it. It never made it to the table. We had all ran out of drinks by this time and we had to stop her again to ask for refeels. 3 of us thanked he and we didn't even get so much as a grunt back from her. Then she brings out the appitser I had ordered. I thanked her, again nothing. When she brought out checks out, she put them at one end of the table, I handed them out to everyone. One of our party members left the exact change, one paid with all Bill's and the rest were paying with cards. She picked up the two that left cash and left our cards on the table. She came back and laid the money down from the order that paid the exact change, minus the change. She said, she didn't pay enough and walked away, again leaving the cards on the table. I looked at the check and the total was $13.21, I got a quarter and put it on top of the bill's. She came back, look to see how much the ticket was then counted the money. This is when she mumbled under her breath "No tip? I guess I work for free."  And without stopping to think I said, "I guess you do when you are rude as hell to everyone at our table. I then went through the list of everything above, picked up my CC and handed it to her. And I know, she could have been having a bad day, but it does not take much to say You're welcome.

name: Sherri Lynn
text: The sirloin, tilapia,  & garden bar was amazing.......Unfortunately I had to substitute my Pineapple Upside-down Cake with Cheesecake.......ok no worries. My door dash driver did call to ask my preference for the substitute 🏆 Someone forgot to include the additional cheesecake with our order. I shouldn't have to share my dessert on Valentines Day 😕

name: Angelia Thomas
text:
I took my kids here for dinner tonight. First and last time at this location. I go to Ruby Tuesday all the time back in SWFL so I thought ok the food will be good since I'm in town visiting I don't know where to go for good food. The whole experience started out horrible and ended horrible.

We get there and get seated. We waited 15-20 minutes just to put our drink orders in. We waited another 15-20 minutes for our drinks. We had an unsweet tea and a chocolate milk. Once when we got our drinks we ordered the food. I ordered my usual that I always order back home. When our food had arrived I was changing my son's diaper our food had arrived. My son's pasta was hot but my ribs that I had ordered was cold. I had waved the server down a couple of times but he never checked up on us. He saw me eating my son's pasta because my son wasn't eating it and he didn't ask if anything was wrong. When he finally checked on us we were done eating. I told him my ribs was cold and he asked if I wanted a fresh whole rack of ribs. I said no thanks and requested my meal to be removed. No manager came over to check up on us to apologize or anything. I'm so glad the one I go to all the time isn't like this.

name: MONICA MCCALL
text: Both the food and service were amazing!

name: Steven Brian Powell
text: They don’t deserve one star, I live near Troy so I visit this restaurant often over the years, or I use to, the last 3 times there it has been over an hour wait with the last time being the worse, we ordered to go curb Side pickup at 1300 was suppose to be ready by 1327, at 1320 we called in to check in when we arrived, at 1350 we called back in to see how much longer, a guy came out and said about 10 more minutes, well at 1430 I called back in and asked to talk to a manager( I prepaid with a tip, so that’s why I didn’t just leave) he then brought our food out without the drinks so he had to go back and get them, he brought out drinks, no sorry for the wait nothing, we literally opened the food as we left and it was all cold, I wanted to take it back and throw it in the floor but my wife wouldn’t let me, so we heated it up at home and made the best of it, that food was around $75 plus a $20 tip, you better enjoy that RT because I have spent my last dollar at your business, and I will be sure to tell all who will listen how incompetent your establishment is, hopefully this review saves someone the same trouble, don’t go there, hell go to McDonald’s at least it’s hot food

name: Roger Stone
text:
Excellent, had the flat iron steak. Very good and the Ruby Tuesday's cause was
also very good. Service was immediate and prices very reasonable.

name: China Reed
text: food was great and so was the customer service

name: Samantha Sanders
text: Service and food was great will definitely be back

name: Angie Wamsley
text: We had the BEST experience at the restaurant in Troy Alabama with Cameron our waitress and Miss Kim the manager!! We went once and were so well taken care of we went back 2 days later! They were both so kind, professional and we felt like we were the only ones in the restaurant. We are visiting Troy from up north wish we lived here because we’ve never had such wonderful people serve us. Thanks so much Cameron and Miss Kim for making our dining experience so special!!!

resp.text: Thank you for dining with id's! I'm so glad we made your visit ski wonderful!!

name: Alma Sparrow
text: I love the salad bar

name: Carol Pittman
text: Covid has been around for months and just now you decide to use credit machine at the table.  I want to choose my own amount of tip, not your choices.  Can no longer get a side salad as one of two sides???? Not good.  No refill on tea.  Took forever to get someone to notice we were ready to go.  Won't be back for a long time.

name: Jordan Garrison
text: I ordered tilapia and it was RAW. Pink in the middle, would not recommend this Ruby Tuesday.

name: Corey Owens
text: a little slow. Food is ok

name: Tiffany Lee
text: Quiet and clean the food was good

name: DaltonAdkison 12
text: Overall it was bad. Service was slow. Before getting a drink order when the waitress was 2 tables down having a long conversation with other customers while waiting without drinks. It was about 10 minutes plus before we got drinks. Hostess apparently didn’t tell the waitress we we’re here when there was only 4 tables occupied in the restaurant. Everything was brought out but had to repeatedly ask for items that were missing.. Also asked for a lava cake but received something totally different. Asked server If this was right( me knowing it was the wrong thing) she continued to tell me yes she was sure it was right. She brought out the chocolate tall cake instead of the lava cake. Just slow and sloppy know it all service.

name: Lynette Mosley
text: Love, love, love this place. Food us always good and the BEST coffee around.

name: Annie Hill
text: Love the salad bar.wonderful food

name: Jon Caldwell
text: Never have menu items I order, the staff hovers when you try to tip on their little device.  3 visits.. 3 times not getting what I order..   And the restaurant was about 85 degrees inside.  Wth. Rude staff.

name: Sharon Richards
text: Olive Garden is always amazing.  The food is good, staff very friendly and accommodating.  They have their standard menu available all the time. But, they also have special that rotate around.  Such as Lobster fest, unlimited shrimp or unlimited pasta bowl and dine in and take one home.  The bathrooms and booths are clean.  Staff we dressed without strict uniforms.  We always highly recommend Olive Garden..  wish they delivered!

name: Osvsldo Roman
text: Great service and food! Extremely hot when dinning in!! Overall great experience! Please get A/C fixed for the sake of the workers who are working in all black uniforms!

name: Bill Scott
text: Nice service  a place u need to go to

name: Mason Quinn
text: The people are nice and they fixed our food, but it should have never came out ice cold in the first place.

name: Vicat
text: Wonderful service, good food although a little bland, very clean.

name: Lynn Miller
text: Very good!

name: Anthony Davis
text: Great food. Lisa manage is great down to earth

name: Carolyn Shaff
text: Salad bar lacking and took a while to get bill.

name: Margo Benitez
text: the place was empty it took forever to get my order

name: Robert Webb
text:
Ribs awesome
Quick service no waiting
No beer available
Must wear gloves for self serve salad seems as ridiculous as the whole mask ordeal
Ruby relaxer named appropriately

name: Brandy Harris
text:
The service was great, the food was great, our server was great, but as we sat there we noticed and we take notice to things being an interacial couple that they were wearing all the interacial couples and black families on the left side of the the restaurant. They sat all the white people on the right side. It
didn't matter about the group size because the tables were the same. It looked really strange . I gave them 5 stars because the food and service was good but the seating was off. And we were there about 2 hours and it was the same when we got there and while we were leaving.

name: kenny brown
text: Friendly service, great food

name: William Officer
text: awesome dinner tonight with friend Mike. Our service was wonderful. Our waitress was Diamond and she was awesome. she is a grear salad maker. we got tge honor of meating the very nice manager Kim. She came  and has a lovely conversation with her. awesome expeeirnce with a proefessional staff. oh yeah and the food was great

name: Roger Etheredge
text: Great service. Friendly staff

name: Kent Ligtenberg
text: Pretty expedient service and good drinks. Great atmosphere to make anyone feel welcome. Will be back.

name: Jenny Floyd
text: I have waited months for the rice they make that I eat w my blackened shrimp and broccoli... It was delicious as always!

resp.text: Thank you so much for dining with us again!

name: Tricia DeLeonardis
text: Good salad bar and service! The 1/2 rack if ribs looked small but he enjoyed them!! The peach flavored lemonade was soooo sweet and over powering we had to add water!!  But we will be back!

name: Cox and Son Machine
text: They where slow getting my order ready 20min turned in to an hour.

name: Kathy Allen
text: Today made twice that we went here and both times there were empty tables and several of them yet a 20 minute wait on being seated.  Was not happy so we left. They could have at least seated us.

name: Amber
text: I ate here last night with my family. My sister found blonde hair in her food; the New Orleans Seafood Platter was disgusting; and someone came into the restaurant with a dog. The customer took the dog outside but he came back in and went to the salad bar without washing his hands.

name: Rob Lacy
text: Great bar food. A nice place to stop and get off the road for a little bit.

name: Susan Petrey Carriker
text: Great service! Salad bar was amazing! I had a classic burger and enjoyed every bite. The iced tea was cold and fresh (I had several refills). Ruby Tuesday's is a consistent winner. We will be back!

name: George Jones
text: Service waiter was very polite and timely . we both had the salad bar. One of the best salad bars I have seen. Very fresh and tasty .

name: Geraldine smith
text: My favorite place to be!! The food is so wonderful good, good and very good.  We have been coming for years.  Thank you!!

name: mickey johnson
text: Great salad bar with very nice staff

name: Linda Patrick
text: It was great the food was good the service was good can't wait to go back and I live at least 50 miles away they closed our Ruby Tuesday in Dothan Alabama so now I found another one

name: Rick Snowden
text: Slow service, food not to RT standard  no bourbon available, bad experience, cold food waited over an hour.

name: Gaming with Ronald Austin
text: Great food great service

name: Mrs Steward
text: Love the fresh salad bar I could eat there everyday of my life!

name: C.J. Reed
text: Love the Troy, Alabama location! Best "Turkey Burger, I have ever had!" Great service.

name: Bill Russell
text: Waitress was awesome. The manager kept coming out to look around and then leave again. The hostess was to busy talking to say thank you for coming or goodbye or whatever their supposed to be doing. Pay attention to detail let you customers finish there appetizer or salads before rushing their food out. The one good thing was the waitress (Taylor) was super fun and personal.

name: Life Unabridged
text: Terrable service. Waiter took our drink order then we waited 20 minutes for another waiter to retake our drink order then waited an additional 10 minutes for the second order. I'm usually patient but the service here is definitely lacking. Only reason we didn't leave is my 4 year olds we're very hungry and I didn't want to wait at another restaurant

name: Rev. Thomas Lee Windham
text: Excellent service.  Great salad bar.  Entrees were not very good.  Party of four with four different entrees and two were not worth eating.  The fried shrimp were okay and my wifes avocado burger was good.  I had chicken tenders which were not good (old and very rubbery) and my daughter had a grilled chicken breast that was closer to a slice of rubber than chicken.  Disappointed and the food tasted microwaved and not fresh made.

name: Melisa
text: The salad bar is plentiful, the ribs are delious Our waiter was so attentive I will return.

name: Allison Karsten
text: Food was amazing. The server Diamond SUCKED

name: Chalbaka Thomas
text: The employees were very courteous but our food was Bland, this was upsetting, on the other hand the salad was amazing!

name: rae douglas
text: The poor closer waiter was so overwhelmed on a SAT Eve. I had to beg underage hostess for my drink while he attended a new bigger party. In the end the hostess was taking 3 other tables orders...it wasn't even 8 pm... Why cut your waitress down to one on Saturday night?? I was drinking an $8 drink would have drank 2 if I had ANY attention at all.  Food good.

name: cynthia Helms
text: Wonderful food. Excellent service, very friendly staff

name: Donna P.
text: Excellent food, service, and atmosphere!

name: Raj Tyner
text: Nice friendly staff & atmosphere. Food was great also.

name: Sabrina Bird
text:
Very friendly & professionally dressed employees.
Food was amazingly full of flavor. Not long wait time on busy Sunday after church.

name: John Greer
text: Service was excellent & frieldly.   Salad bar was a little low several items but the food was good.

name: Michael Porter
text: Good food service was ok

name: Jeremy Mathews
text: Great, friendly service. The food was perfectly cooked as ordered (I ordered a sirloin medium and it was perfectly medium). The waitress was extremely friendly and attentive. Great experience if you don't mind paying a little more.

name: Phillip O Ramsey
text: The food was good but the portions was small . I Got steak & shrimp, small steak and 4 shrimp. The salad came in a 4" X 4" bowl. They do not serve any bread with your meal. To some people it does not matter but I'm a Big fan of bread with my meal. I myself don't think I will return there to eat !

name: Jeannie Hussey
text: Food was really good

name: Michele Jordan
text: Only had the Soup and salad. It was good. Building needs G little work

name: Malcolm Banks
text: Drove here from Montgomery to use my birthday burger coupon because there is no longer a Ruby Tuesday in Montgomery. The food was ok and the service was good but the restaurant itself feels really old

name: Crystal Purvis
text: It was average.

name: Brittany Howard
text: Food was piping hot like I like it, we had a new server Maura? She was wonderful and really took care of us! Really a great lunch experience!

name: HHilda Harris
text: The food was delicious and it had a friendly atmosphere.

name: Gary Brust
text: Good

name: Linda Patrick
text: great food great service can'twait to stop in again

name: Richard McCauley
text: Enjoyed a nice meal. During our travels

name: dgrimsley5176 Wallace
text: The food good, but the service was a disaster.....

name: ben kaufman
text: The service in town had a waitress on her second day at work gave us five star attention

name: Debbie Schuttner
text: After 3 attempts to get order correct they still didn't get it right🙁

name: Tommy Kidd
text: The service was great and the food was magnificent

name: Scott Slatten
text: A lot of young people working there that really don't have any experience in providing good service.  A lot of bickering and socializing amongst themselves. And then the food is passable. I tried them twice now because they were walking distance to the hotel. I am driving next time.

name: Gennie Lightner
text: It too a hour to get our food No apology no discount. Sat the check down and left.l lMELISSA WAS TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!!!

name: Mark Bailey
text: One of the few chain sit down restaurants in Troy.  They do a good job making sure that the salad bar is filled and the lettuce is fresh.  Ive also ordered catering from this location and the food was ready on time.

name: LaTara Joseph
text: I love Ruby Tuesdays salad bar

name: Maggie Wallenmaier
text: I have never been any place that was so slow.  And my food was cold when I received it.. I think they can do better

name: David Sosebee
text: 99% of the time it's Great!

name: Jeffrey Bundy
text: Great meal and great service.

name: TB
text: Our party moved from the first table because it was so nasty. Didn't say anything about it. Moved to a second table by the window and it was dirty and everything around it was. We showed the manager and his response was it was the night shift. Yes this place was nasty when they first open with means two shift didn't clean. Nice👍

name: Virgil Sentel
text: We had went to Troy to go to dinner at another restaurant. When we got there we found out our original choice closes at 3 on Saturday. I'm glad we passed Ruby Tuesdays on th way in to town. We went back and ate there instead. We love their salad bar(about the only one around anymore). The food was excellent and the service was good. Not out of the way, and reasonably priced. A good choice.

name: Kaley Green
text: Hickory anything and you can't go wrong

name: Janice Bray-Smith
text: Mother's birthday dinner. Employees very nice.

name: Ronda Kirby
text: Rude, they seat you where you're blocked in and can't get to the salad bar.  The girl that seated us I felt she did this on purpose. We ended up eating out appetizer and left.

name: Quinnda McMullen
text: Horrible salad bar with dried out food, nails sticking out of side of bench seat, tore my 35.00 special made shirt, they are right where small children walk by and neither waitress could give a flip that was preparing our Table. My husband's steak wasn't cooked right and he specifically asked for no sour cream on his potato. When asked​ for to go drinks, they weren't topped off. We had to ask for lids and the waiter said the manager said they did not have lids. My husband saw lids on way to bathroom. He requested to speak to the manager. No one had told her about issues. I noticed people leaving without eating full meals. The waiter didn't even know what beer they had on tap and yelled across the room at the guy who asked about beer, he asked to see menu, waiter yelled out on table. This is what it is like to eat at Troy, AL Ruby Tuesday. No wonder the one in our city closed down.

name: Alex Means
text:
Spent 30 minutes waiting for my appetizer only to find they put it in a to go box and let it get cold.

Gabe me the wrong order when my food finally did get here. Some food never came, some was burnt, replacement never came.

After telling them they gave me the wrong order, they proceded to remake the wrong dish again, after asking me if I wanted what I originally ordered.

Do not plan on returning

name: Dawn Reyes
text: Service was prompt, but food (Salad bar) was mediocre. Just not crisp, cold or fresh.

name: Aleana Culpepper
text: Food was good service great

name: Lori Miller
text: I travel. Most times I am stopping to eat during off hours. Still, the salad bar was filled and fresh. Staff was friendly and prompt. The food was great.

name: Keith Merritt
text: Good burger for ten bucks.

name: Marcus Carroll
text: Best experience at this chain. Food arrived in good time, proper temp on all steaks and salad bar has been spruced up. It's also walking distance to 2 of the nicer hotels in town.

name: Guy Vandelune
text: Wonderful management here. Very impressed.

name: Calista Dubose
text:
Food was delicious and server was awesome
First visit in awhile but will return soon

name: John Moore
text: Awesome service

name: Vivian Gerrietts
text: I've missed that RT salad bar since it moved out of our home area.

name: Daniel Wilson
text: Went there last night for dinner. Horrible service and the salad bar was not fully stocked the whole time we were there.

name: Sapphira Wolf (Saiya)
text: I didnt like that they messed up my order.

name: Sandy Stremming
text: I never understand why hostesses would place you at the furtherest table away when the restaurant is nearly empty.   :(      Food was wonderful.

name: Tracy Fender
text: Loved it!

name: Johnny Johnson
text: Food was very good and the staff was very friendly and efficient

name: Charles Smith
text: Good food and service

name: phillip dixon
text: food is always great not matter which one i go to and the actual hire polite people

name: Dennis Wallinger
text: Love the salad bar and our service was awesome.

name: ax504music
text: Great food and the people are so nice 😊

name: Maria Smith
text: Server was very friendly

name: Duke
text: Great service, but food is just not great.

name: Donna Jordan
text: Always good food and good service

name: Jane Ward
text: We took a friend there for her birthday. Our attendant was kind & professional. The meal was tasty.

name: greg derzis
text: Good place to get dinner with family, young or old. A few tvs at the bar if you want a quiet place for a beer, and sports. Menu is the same as all the other locations, I'm partial to the New Orleans seafood dish. They also have a full salad bar, as well as drive up take out. You order over the phone, or internet, pull up, and they bring your order right to your car. The staff are pretty helpful, and knowledgeable about their menu.

name: Ethan Acison
text: We had a good server however mine and my mom's food was cooked a little extra to long.

name: Jeanette Milliean
text: Waitress was very friendly and attentive. Food was just ok

name: Blanche Bors
text: Great food,  great salad bar.  Server was a little new but still very good,  attentive but not annoying.

name: Larry w
text: Went today for lunch. Service was very slow. Never offered a drink refill, took forever to get my bill, and I got tired of waiting on the “to go” tea I asked for, so I gave up and left.

name: Peggy Meeter
text: We eat at Ruby Tuesday quite often. Food Is good.

name: Marilyn Carey
text: Not too busy in early afternoon. Our server was courteous and helpful. Yummy food.

name: tiraline woods
text: I was very pleased with my service from the nice young lady name Erin at the drive-thru on 5/9/19. Thanks!😊

name: Gilbert Lampley
text: The service was good, the kitchen need some help!

name: Trish Meeks
text:
My order was wrong & the kitchen manager attempted to fix it, his first attempt failed but the third time it was good..my timeline proves the amount of time I spent in restaurant (food for call in was ready on arrival) The steak pictured is a Rib eye with Asigo cheese & black peppercorn (actually it is not but that was the order)
Next I was not very happy with service while checking out, upon arrival she handed me my food & went to get my To Go containers, sounds OK BUT I had called twice to make sure they understood it was a 20 min drive before I arrived & I had ordered salads I had to make...after making salads she handed me a bag and walked off, OK there are not many chances to earn that tip but here is one, it's a struggle getting those containers into the bag, its so helpful when they assist. Last but most important she did not check the food with me!
My next visit was very much an improvement!

name: Amy Copeland
text: They have a wonderful salad bar for takeout lunch.

name: Sherri Cain
text: The food was over cooked, just aweful,we got a to go box and fed it to my dog,60.00 worth of garbage

name: Justin Stephens
text: Everyone is nice.  Beers are cold and salad bar has always been fresh.

name: Joann Taylor
text: Salad bar lettuce needed to be fresher.

name: Charles Adamson
text: It was good

name: Shelia Duncan
text: Service was very good, food was excellent.  Great salad bar, no problems or issues

name: Khori Smith
text: Service was good. Food and Florine’s were good. Three to many flies.

name: Carolyn Daniel
text: It was very good.

name: James Dixson
text: Wonderful can't wait to go back

name: Lady Charlamayne
text: I went there for my birthday. The food was good.

name: Ella R. Brown
text: Everything was Excellent employees were very nice

name: Forrest Brown
text: Sat at the bar and had excellent service. Only had a salad but everyone was friendly.

name: Jillian Hofstra
text: Always nice to me even when I make silly mistakes like spilling stuff all over the place. God bless these people.

name: WuPiDu
text: Simple solution to stop people from using y'alls coupons. don't print or offer them!

name: Brenda Floyd
text: Dirty

name: Catherine McClellan
text: Service was great food okay

name: Maria Cortes
text: My son and I had a late lunch about a week ago. Enjoyed the new salad bar. We had a nice mother and son evening.

name: Laziza Kodirova
text:
One star just for good service.
The food (specially steak) and salad bar was awful.

name: Shawniya
text: Ruby Tuesday is one of my favorites, but the Troy location has disappointed me on 3 occassions now. The food is always great so hats off to the cook. I wish there was an area setup to tip them. However, service was substandard and dining area was messy/unclean. I had to wipe debris from my table and chair on each occassion. Plus I asked for a lunch menu on a Sunday, was given a menu, but did not receive lunch menu prices. I should have been told BEFORE ordering that lunch prices did not apply on SUNDAY.

name: Al Taylor
text: Good food, good service, good value.

name: Mary Jo Williams
text: Salad bar was good!  Waiter was nice.

text: Pork Chop was boiled!

name: Robert Jenkins
text: Had the salad bar and it was good

name: Courtney Nicol
text: Despite the food being good.. the service has become lack luster. Several times now I've visited for lunch and it is under staffed and unclean. New management has happened several times hopefully they'll get someone that can whip the place back into shape.

text: Pretty good!

name: keith davis
text: What can I say. Best salad bar ever

name: Ernest Capozzoli
text: Had to wait to get a table while the person at the register had to set up a table for 12 while other employees (3) stood behind the bar and saw the reception area getting backed up.  My food was marginal, Tilapia tasted muddy- should have sent it back. However, my wife's chicken dish was excellent.  Salad bar was good.  Server was prompt and courteous.  I only eat here on rare occasions.  Last time (one year ago) I had to argue with the bartender about a gin and tonic that I wanted with a twist of lime.  I wanted lime but rather than just comply I was informed; many like their G&T without a twist of lime- really can you be that customer insensitive?

name: Debra Davis
text: Not good at all the waiter try keep geting our plates we were no wher fishe i want be going back

name: Marisa Quick
text: Service was ok. Food is just ok. Nothing spectacular or note worthy. Doesn't get a better rating because I had to repeatedly ask for refills and my side order, also my fries were cold and a tad under cooked.

text: Food is good but the lunch service is slow.
